summary: Email from Emma Parry, a reporter at The Sun, to an unspecified recipient regarding a source in prison who claims to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The source wants to cooperate with authorities on the Maxwell case and has named many individuals involved in underage sex activities.

persons.name: Emma Parry
persons.context: Digital US Correspondent for The Sun who emailed about a source with information on Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, seeking to facilitate the source's cooperation with authorities.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a central figure in the case, with a source claiming to have information about her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and underage sex activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named alongside Ghislaine Maxwell as a central figure in the case involving underage sex activities.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the case involving underage sex activities, as referenced by the source.
Parry is a reporter seeking to facilitate information sharing about Maxwell to authorities.
Parry is a reporter seeking to facilitate information sharing about Epstein to authorities.

events.title: Reporter email about source cooperation
events.description: Emma Parry emails an unspecified recipient about a prison source who wants to cooperate with authorities on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, claiming to have information about many individuals involved in underage sex activities.

locations: London, SE1 9GF (registered office of News Corp UK & Ireland Limited)
keyFacts: A reporter from The Sun has a source currently in prison who claims to have extensive information about Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein's involvement with underage sex activities.
The source has cooperated with ATF on other cases and now wants to cooperate with authorities on the Maxwell case.
The source named many individuals to the reporter, but these names were not published and are being offered to investigators.
The reporter is seeking to facilitate the source's cooperation with authorities and is asking for guidance on how to proceed.
